meanings.definition: A substance that can be converted into a vitamin within the body.
meanings.sent1: Eating foods rich in provitamins helps our bodies make essential vitamins.
meanings.sent2: Many fruits and vegetables contain provitamins that are beneficial for our health.
meanings.sent3: The provitamins in carrots are like little vitamin factories inside us!
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge acted as provitamins, transforming into wisdom as she grew.
meanings.sent5: Think of provitamins as tiny vitamin seeds waiting to bloom in our bodies.

meanings.definition: Compounds that are precursors to vitamins and can be converted into active vitamins by the body.
meanings.sent1: Supplements often contain provitamins that the body can change into useful vitamins.
meanings.sent2: Our bodies rely on provitamins to produce the necessary vitamins for good health.
meanings.sent3: The provitamins in the pills were like secret agents, waiting to turn into vitamins.
meanings.sent4: His ideas were the provitamins of innovation, waiting to be transformed into groundbreaking products.
meanings.sent5: The provitamins acted as silent helpers, turning into powerful vitamins when needed.
